<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Gylou (Handmaiden Devil)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=610)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Though gylous are deeply entrenched in the expansive and complex machinations of [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18), they are highly skilled agents capable of nuanced diplomacy, masterful deception, physical finesse, and nearly any other tasks they set their minds to. This versatility has led to gylous becoming widespread throughout all layers of Hell, enabling them to filter key information to their masters regarding other devils' plots and schemes. Their allegiance is no secret, but their skills are so great that powerful devils employ one or more gylous regardless. While most gylous have a feminine form (combined with their role, this is the source of their common moniker of “handmaiden”), some have other gender presentations, and nearly all gylous take on carefully cultivated illusions to best suit the roles they fill. More often than not, gylous arise when lesser devils who have demonstrated exceptional utility and invaluable skills are uplifted into a new form, though on rare occasions they are shaped from the souls of evil mortals who showed unparalleled savvy within bureaucratic enterprises.

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Gylou](/Monsters.aspx?ID=610)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=44" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 75 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +28; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +25, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +30, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +28, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +26, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +7

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +8
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +28 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 240

**Immunities**
fire

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277))

**Weaknesses**
good 10

**Reflexive Grab** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature leaves a square within the gylou's reach using a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action or attempts a melee Strike against the gylou; **Effect** The gylou lashes out with a tentacle, attempting to Grapple the triggering creature. If the triggering Strike was with a melee weapon, the attacking creature can [Release](/Actions.aspx?ID=83) the weapon to cause the gylou to automatically fail the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, climb 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d8+12 slashing plus 1d6 evil

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tentacle +30 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+12 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 36, attack +28
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (×3), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104) (at will)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) (at will)
- **7th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)
- **Constant (7th)**
[True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Rituals** DC 36

- **1st**
[Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The gylou adopts the appearance of any Small or Medium [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). This doesn't change their Speed or the attack and damage modifiers of their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

**Indispensable Savvy** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The gylou attempts a skill check but hasn't rolled yet; **Effect** The gylou demonstrates a preternatural ability for the task at hand. They use their [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) modifier for the triggering check and for all skill checks using the same skill thereafter until the next time the gylou uses this ability or until 24 hours have passed, whichever happens first.

**Tentacle Encage** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Requirements** The gylou has a Medium or smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The gylou transfers the grabbed creature into their lower body's net of encaging tentacles, freeing their limbs and tentacles to make Strikes. This has the same effects as [Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35) (Medium, 2d12+12 bludgeoning, Rupture 30), except the encaged creature is not at risk of suffocation, and the gylou can bring the encaged creature with them when they cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69). A gylou can have only one creature encaged at a time.

</column>
